channel.title: Server project ~Rsc~ Experienced only
channel.description:
Hi, I am "Coder" I come from Rune server,and other types of forums.
If you would like to join you must meet the requirements
* knows how to code C++,Java,Or Html * Coding a Rs classic server * advanced coders. * Ability to code * I will be handing out files for people to edit\fix, * For example The config folder and Npchandler would go to 1 coder. * The Event folder will go to another coder * And so on. * Total of coder needed.. = 5 coders max. ___________________________________________________________________________________________
Well this project is going to be a *Rs Classic* source I am making a team of coders that are willing to go with each other and make the *Ultimate source*
(That will not be released, only to the people that are in the team will have it)
If you would like to join you can contact me on IRC
IRC server = Irc.moparisthebest.com Join = #projectrsc
Or you can contact me on this thread, In order to join you will have to show some proof of your coding ability\and or show me something you have made. _________________________________________________________________________________________
When you join the IRC we will discuss on what Our base of our source will be. We will discuss if there should be a point system or a regular combat system (Really up to you guys)
Base's of sources that we can start off with.
*Divinepk* *Demonik* *Rscd v25*
Or any other kind of source that you would like the project to start off in, we will have a vote.
Members *None yet*
Thanks for reading this and I hope you will join!
- Coders

item.title: Server project ~Rsc~ Experienced only
item.dc:creator: @extacy extacy
item.description:
@extacy wrote:

Wow, where do I start …

I will bold in the areas I personally thought was funny.

* Coding a Rs classic server <----- [b]Well isn't that a give away? lol[/b] * advanced coders. <----[b]ADVANCED coders? OH you mean people who can do more than XML editing.[/b] * Ability to code <----[b]Ability to code? It's not something you can naturally do by nature lol[/b] * I will be handing out files for people to edit\fix, <----[b]You mean, giving out the work, and taking the credit?[/b] * For example The config folder and Npchandler would go to 1 coder. <---- [b]sorry, but are you fucking kidding me?[/b] * The Event folder will go to another coder<-----[b]The event folder? Do you even know what it affects or even does?[/b]

Read full topic

item.title: Server project ~Rsc~ Experienced only
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

If experienced programmers are what you seek, then why not start from scratch instead of continuing on an already existing source? I mean, if the people getting involved really are experienced, I see no reason not to (it wouldn’t be too hard as I see it), as the current servers does have flaws little here and little there, which could be removed with a proper design.

Also, you could take all (or atleast most, depending on how much you look in other sources) of the credits for your work.

And yes, as xEnt stated, I think you need to add some information about what you personally have done before. That you have programmed in C++, Java and HTML really doesn’t say anything… For instance, how long have you programmed in each and every of these languages? What sorts of programs/applications etc. have you made? Have you any greater knowledge of server-development and design patterns etc?

Read full topic

item.description:

If you want some people to help you, post what you have done before you ask for there skills.

Well this project is going to be a Rs Classic source

(That will not be released, only to the people that are in the team will have it)
